home.title: Nebiswera - Learn Georgian Language Online
home.description: Master the Georgian language with interactive lessons, cultural insights, and personalized learning paths. Start your journey today.

about.title: About Us - Nebiswera
about.description: Learn about Nebiswera's mission to make Georgian language accessible to learners worldwide through modern teaching methods.

contact.title: Contact Us - Nebiswera
contact.description: Get in touch with the Nebiswera team. We're here to help with your Georgian language learning journey.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Nebiswera
privacy.description: Read Nebiswera's privacy policy. Learn how we protect your data and respect your privacy.

terms.title: Terms of Service - Nebiswera
terms.description: Review Nebiswera's terms of service. Understand the rules and guidelines for using our platform.

login.title: Sign In - Nebiswera
login.description: Sign in to your Nebiswera account to continue your Georgian language learning journey.

register.title: Create Account - Nebiswera
register.description: Join Nebiswera and start learning Georgian today. Create your free account in seconds.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password - Nebiswera
forgotPassword.description: Forgot your password? Reset it here to regain access to your Nebiswera account.

resetPassword.title: Set New Password - Nebiswera
resetPassword.description: Create a new password for your Nebiswera account.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email - Nebiswera
verifyEmail.description: Verify your email address to activate your Nebiswera account.

verifyRequired.title: Email Verification Required - Nebiswera
verifyRequired.description: Please verify your email address to continue using Nebiswera.

authError.description: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
